backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles, authorization, prices, and paper‑trading operations with admin‑restricted price updates and per‑user state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels for the Aurex project.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their purpose and functionality within the Aurex app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining design tokens, color variables, and light/dark theme styles for the frontend UI.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the Aurex React app and loading the main TypeScript entry module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application shell handling authentication, routing, theme, layout, and page rendering for the Aurex simulator.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Authentication gate component that blocks access until Internet Identity finishes loading and the user is logged in.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with loading states and React Query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for initializing a user profile, capturing a name and creating a profile with default values.
frontend/src/components/branding/AboutSe: Displays Aurex information including leadership, mission, and platform description.
frontend/src/components/branding/AurexBr: Renders the Aurex logo and branding header with icon.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerBanner: UI banner displaying a warning that Aurex is a simulated paper‑trading platform using virtual money only.
frontend/src/components/formatters/money: Utility functions to format bigint amounts into standard or compact USD strings.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainN: Tab-based navigation bar for switching between dashboard, trade, portfolio, and history pages.
frontend/src/components/prices/PriceMana: Component to view and update the current price of a symbol with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/usePlaceMar: Hook for placing market orders and invalidating related portfolio and history queries.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useSaveCall: Hook to save the current user's profile and refresh profile data.
frontend/src/hooks/mutations/useUpdatePr: Hook for updating a price and invalidating price-related queries.
Fetches the full list of prices when an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useCurrentUse: Fetches and exposes the logged-in user's profile with loading state adjustments.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useHoldings.t: Retrieves the user's current holdings from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePortfolioV: Fetches the user's portfolio valuation from the backend.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/usePrice.ts: Fetches the price for a specific symbol when available.
frontend/src/hooks/queries/useTradeHisto: Retrieves the user's trade history via their profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages creation and lifecycle of the backend actor tied to Internet Identity and triggers query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus Aurex theme variables, background, and dark mode definitions.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and mounting the app.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Displays user profile and portfolio valuation stats with loading skeletons and an account summary section.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Fetches and displays executed trade history in a table with loading states and profit/loss formatting.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Shows current holdings enriched with live prices and total portfolio value, with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/pages/TradePage.tsx: Provides a form to place market buy or sell orders with validation, error handling, and price management.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and container settings.
project_state.json: Defines the current Aurex project state, listing existing implemented features and pending feature requests for the paper‑trading app. Includes metadata like schema version, project version, and requirement mappings.
